segments.text: The woman continues to dry her plate, utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the water stream over the sink's edge, creating a wide puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how deeply focused she is on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are embarking on their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really taking a huge risk on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of anger at the thought of the potential injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a shocking display of unawareness from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised she hasn't sensed any of the commotion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wants to shout a warning to prevent a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The slippery floor and the unstable stool are a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear for the boy, teetering on the brink of falling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess this will all become if no one intervenes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a scene fraught with danger that goes unheeded.
segments.speaker: PAR
